entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
